mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}

select * from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,b.* from project b,(select @rownum:=0)as tmp
where id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by id DESC ) as projectlist
where rownum > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum<= #{pageNum}*#{amount}

select count(*) from project
where id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
